title: Privacy Hardening & Digital Safety
headline: Lock down your data, wherever you are.
description: We guide you remotely through privacy best practices: encrypted tools, secure browsers, VPNs, DNS filtering, and more. Take control of your digital footprint.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Most operating systems and apps collect telemetry by default, sending data to vendors without asking for permission.
Your browser history, IP address, and device fingerprint can be used to track you across sites even with cookies turned off.
Many so-called private apps still connect to third-party servers unless properly configured or replaced.

sections.heading: What We Cover
items: Configure privacy-respecting browsers with hardened settings and trusted extensions
Set up secure email and encrypted messaging platforms with minimal metadata leakage
Apply DNS filtering to block ad networks, trackers, and malicious infrastructure
Choose and configure VPNs, proxies, or anonymization tools suited to your threat model
Lock down mobile and desktop operating systems by disabling telemetry, location tracking, and unwanted background services

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: We connect with you over a secure remote session, walk through your current tools and habits, and configure each setting step by step. No guesswork, no jargon, just clear instructions and real results.
